mapper.select: SELECT notice_num, title, hit_cnt, TO_CHAR(created_datetime, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_datetime FROM notice ORDER BY notice_num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, contents) VALUES (#{title}, #{contents}) RETURNING notice_num
mapper.select: SELECT notice_num as notice_num, title, contents, hit_cnt, TO_CHAR(created_datetime, 'YYYY.MM.DD HH24:MI:SS') AS created_datetime FROM notice WHERE notice_num = #{notice_num}
